laboratory_examinations.findings: 2+ ketones, 1+ blood, 0 to 3 red cells per high-power field; otherwise normal.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Computed Tomography (CT) of the abdomen and pelvis
laboratory_examinations.findings: Heterogeneous, lobulated mass, 5.7 cm by 6.5 cm in the pelvis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Mass enlarged to approximately 8.2 cm by 10.7 cm by 8.7 cm on second admission.

findings.Lab values noted: Other blood levels of glucose, total protein, albumin, globulin, amylase, and lactate dehydrogenase were normal.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Hematocrit increased to 31.8%, Hemoglobin increased to 11.2 g/dl, and White-cell count increased to 15,400 on the second admission.
